close-with-changes.title: Are you sure?
close-with-changes.description: You have changes in progress. If you close without saving, you'll lose your changes. Are you sure you want to quit?

other-main-score-in-use.title: A general score is already defined
other-main-score-in-use.description: Would you like to set this score as your general score?

delete-main-score.title: Are you sure?
delete-main-score.description: You are about to delete your simulation's general score. Are you sure you want to continue?

saved-since.hour-ago: Saved an hour ago | Saved {time} hours ago
saved-since.days-ago: Saved a day ago | Saved {time} days ago

saving-changes.error: An error occurred while saving changes.

exporting-scorm.success: Your simulation has been exported to SCORM {version}!
exporting-scorm.error: An error occurred while exporting the simulation.

no-mode-selected.title: No simulation mode selected.
no-mode-selected.description: At least one active option is required to save!

text.title: Text mode
text.description: Your learners will play in an SMS-type conversation.

audio.title: Audio mode
audio.description: Your learners will communicate with the agent via phone call.

video.title: Video mode
video.description: Your learners will meet the agent in a video meeting.

questions.label: Preparing questions
questions.description: The following questions will help the agent prepare for the conversation.

empty.title: No question
empty.description: You haven’t added any question yet. Start by adding one to the simulation.

empty.title: No question
empty.description: You haven’t added any customization question yet. Start by adding one to the simulation.

system-prompt.label: System instructions
system-prompt.description: Describe the simulation content, its scenario, and possible outputs.

empty.title: No section
empty.description: You haven’t added any section yet. Start by adding one to the evaluation.

evaluation-method.label: Evaluation method
evaluation-method.description: Describe how the agent should evaluate the conversation.

empty.title: No axis
empty.description: You haven’t added any axis yet. Start by adding one to the graph.

writing-method.label: Writing method
writing-method.description: Describe how the agent should write the feedback.
